item.title: A New(?) Regression Clustering Algorithm
item.author: stats.at.home@gmail.com (Justin and Rachel Silverman)
item.description: Motivation My Solution - Hybrid K-Means/Linear-Regression with Transformation Starting on Boring Simulated Data Now a more interesting simulated dataset More realistic, presense of observational noise Conclusions and future directions Motivation I am a fan of the Stack Exchange forums. In particular, I like Cross Validated and Stack Overflow. An interesting question regarding clustering was posted recently. Essentially someone had the following dataset. plot(Retirees) Essentially the poster wanted a way of clustering the observations into the “lines” that are fairly easy to observe in the data.
